name: QueryPie
long_description:
QueryPie empowers enterprises to safely operationalize AI.
Built on proven Zero Trust principles, QueryPie connects MCPs, AI agents, and LLMs through a unified control layer â€” enabling secure, autonomous workflows across your cloud, systems, and tools.
We provide both our own secure MCPs and verified server integrations for enterprise platforms like Slack, GitHub, and AWS.
With trusted infrastructure at its core, QueryPie ensures every AI action is governed, auditable, and aligned with your security policy.
